answers.answer: So glad baby and you are ok.
Thanks for the update, glad to hear that you are getting taken care of! Praying for you and baby!
Glad to hear things are improving! Thanks for the update

question: Thank you ladies. They said I was dangerously dehydrated and my body was holding on to any fluid it could. They got the contractions to stop, but they are keeping me because I'm at risk for preeclampsia just like you ladies said. My pressure was through the roof and there was so much protein in my urine. Just waiting for the rest of the tests to come back.
title: UPDATE!!!
